projects.title: IES Sandbox Demos RPA Bots
projects.description: Hybrid RPA + API automation bridging gaps between QuickBase Pipelines and Salesforce Lightning, enabling secure and resilient UI-based automation where APIs were insufficient.
projects.impact: Saves 1,900+ hours annually, accelerates $10–28M in revenue, and scales to 23K external developers.

projects.title: OpSys Hub Ecosystem Integration
projects.description: Evolved the OpSys Hub MVP into a scalable cross-platform system by integrating with ServiceNow, automating ingestion and routing of operational tickets.
projects.impact: Eliminated 100% of manual entry for this workflow and returned 25–30 hours annually in administrative time.

projects.title: Unified Dispute Triage & RCA Framework
projects.description: Centralized six disparate intake routes into a governed dispute management ecosystem with full RCA tracking and cross-functional accountability.
projects.impact: Delivered 425 hours of selling time back to the Partner Org by reducing hunt time from 30 minutes to under 5 minutes.

projects.title: Automation Prioritization & Governance Framework
projects.description: Defined ROI scoring logic and Go/No-Go decision matrix to prioritize automation investments based on revenue impact and speed to benefit.
projects.impact: Transitioned the org away from 'random acts of automation' toward a strategic, value-driven roadmap.

expertise.title: RPA & Automation Architecture
bullets: Designed and deployed high-impact RPA bots using UiPath StudioX with secure SSO credential flows.
Engineered hybrid API + UI automation for complex Salesforce workflows.

expertise.title: Data Engineering & Workflow Automation
bullets: Automated cross-platform operations by integrating ServiceNow and QuickBase into OpSys.
Converted legacy Alteryx logic into scalable Python pipelines with secure token management.

expertise.title: Governance, Prioritization & Strategy
bullets: Created ROI-based automation prioritization framework for engineering investments.
Established RCA taxonomy and cross-functional dispute governance standards.

expertise.title: AI & Intelligent Automation
bullets: Developed LLM-assisted meeting summarization and data extraction workflows.
Exploring agentic AI, RAG, and intelligent tier-1 support prototypes.

expertise.title: Leadership & Enablement
bullets: Mentored Support Ops Analyst into technical system ownership using a Learn–Do–Teach approach.
Shifted team capability toward a Citizen Developer culture.
